body:
Comment 1: 
You can revert to the last stable release, which has no errors, by running

  hg update release

A test failed, as it may do from time to time, while you were running at the development
tip. The failure occurred during the last phase of the build: --- cd ../test. Everything
has built successfully. There's possibly a bug in the division of complex numbers, that
will be fixed soon.
http://groups.google.com/group/golang-checkins/browse_thread/thread/b9a60d8d68055699
